reference:
B. S. Everitt and S. Rabe-Hesketh (2001),
Analysing Medical Data using S-PLUS, Springer, New York, USA.
description:
Description
Survival times in months after mastectomy of women with breast cancer. 
The cancers are classified as having metastized or not based on a 
histochemical marker.
title: Survival Times after Mastectomy of Breast Cancer Patients

parameters.metastized: a factor at levels yes and no.
parameters.event:
a logical indicating if the event was observed (TRUE)
or if the survival time was censored (FALSE).

format: A data frame with 42 observations on the following 3 variables.
